G

Game - Class in hw2
Class representing a game of hangman.
Game(String) - Constructor for class hw2.Game
Constructs a hangman game using the given word as the secret word and the default maximum number of wrong guesses.
Game(String, int) - Constructor for class hw2.Game
Constructs a hangman game using the given word as the secret word and the given value as the maximum number of wrong guesses.
gameOver() - Method in class hw2.Game
Determines whether this game is over.
getDisplayedChar() - Method in class hw2.HideableChar
Returns null if this object is in the hidden state, otherwise returns a one-character string consisting of the character stored in this object.
getDisplayedWord() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns a sequence of HideableChar representing the secret word or phrase.
getHiddenChar() - Method in class hw2.HideableChar
Returns a one-character string consisting of the character stored in this object.
getMaxGuesses() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the maximum number of wrong guesses for this game.
getSecretWord() - Method in class hw2.Game
Returns the complete secret word or phrase as a string.
guessLetter(char) - Method in class hw2.Game
Invoked by the player to guess a letter.
